short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost customer interactions directly from Chrome by integrating it with samespace™.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Interact with your customers directly from the browser. When installed, our refined widget sits pretty next to your other Google Chrome extensions. On successful login, the dock can be used to make and receive calls as well as accept chat requests. 
It integrates seamlessly with any webpage and works in synergy with samespace to deliver superior voice experience and conversations while enhancing overall productivity.

Features
- Supports simple to very sophisticated contact-center interaction scenarios.
- Available on-demand widget; intelligent fading out when inactive.
- Conversation Tagging to add context and classify your data. 
- Simplified call scheduling
- Automatically identifies phone numbers on web pages (Click-2-Call)
- High definition voice experience.
- Supports interoperability with traditional PBX and legacy phone systems.

Benefits
- Deploy a contact center solution for your business, instantly.
- No intricate configuration requirements.
- Easily integrates with all major CRM applications.
- Save on space and reduce operational costs. 
- Beautifully designed app that needs little or no training.
- Saves time and effort, enabling you to deliver superior customer experience.
- samespace™  is an all-in-one solution which ends the need to invest in any complex telephony setup, forever.
